overview.title: Overview
overview.content: PolyTrakt is a polyrhythmic tracker and drum sequencer. Compose music by creating patterns, arranging tracks, and assigning instruments. Use the musical typing keyboard or your mouse to enter notes.

patterns.title: Patterns
patterns.content:
• Patterns are groups of tracks. Use the + and - buttons to add or remove patterns.
  • Switch between patterns using the pattern buttons.
  • Sequence patterns in the Pattern Sequencer row.

tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.content:
• Each track is a row in the sequencer. Add or remove tracks with the + and - buttons.
  • Each track contains equal divisions of note fields where you can input instrument triggers.
  • Use the + and - buttons on each track to add/remove divisions.

instruments.title: Instruments
instruments.content:
• Drag instruments from the Browser to the Instrument slots, or click to select and assign.
  • Click an instrument slot to make it the active instrument for musical typing.

keyboard.title: Musical Typing
keyboard.content:
• Click a note in a track and use your computer keyboard to enter notes.
  • Use the middle keyboard row for notes. Adjust octaves with Z and X.
  • The keyboard helper at the bottom shows the mapping.

saving.title: Saving & Loading
saving.content:
• Click Save to download your project as a JSON file.
  • Click Load to import a previously saved project.

theming.title: Themes
theming.content:
• Choose a theme from the palette menu in the sidebar.
  • Your theme preference is saved automatically.
